value.string:
from_table_list:list
 where_expression
 order_by_expression
 group_by_expression
 selection_domain
 selection_report
 ignore_variation
 standardize
 omit_simulation
 omit_input
 omit_output
 input_simulation_state:list
 output_simulation_state:list

SELECT
 SUM(stock.quantity) AS inventory,
 SUM(stock.quantity) AS total_quantity,
 SUM(stock.price * stock.quantity) AS total_price,
 stock.price AS average_price,
 node.title AS node_title,
 node.relative_url AS node_relative_url,
 section.title AS section_title,
 section.relative_url AS section_relative_url,
 resource.title AS resource_title,
 resource.relative_url AS resource_relative_url,
 stock.variation_text AS variation_text,
 stock.aggregate_text AS aggregate_text,
 stock.resource_uid AS resource_uid,
 stock.uid AS stock_uid,
 stock.date as date,
 stock.simulation_state as simulation_state,
 catalog.path as path
 
 FROM
 stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS section ON (section.uid = stock.section_uid)
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="from_table_list"> 
 <dtml-if expr="table_key != 'stock'">
 , <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>, <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>, <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 , catalog as node, catalog as resource
 
 WHERE
 1 = 1
 <dtml-if where_expression>
 AND <dtml-var where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 AND resource.uid = stock.resource_uid
 
 <dtml-comment>
 XXX How to deal with standardize ?
 </dtml-comment>
 
 <dtml-if omit_simulation>
 AND catalog.portal_type != "Simulation Movement"
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 AND ( stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR inventory_movement.destination_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 AND ( stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR inventory_movement.destination_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL )
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if input_simulation_state>
 <dtml-if output_simulation_state>
 <dtml-if "input_simulation_state == output_simulation_state">
 AND (<dtml-in input_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)
 <dtml-else>
 AND ((stock.quantity>0
 AND (<dtml-in input_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>))
 OR (stock.quantity<0
 AND (<dtml-in output_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)))
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-else>
 AND stock.quantity>0
 AND (<dtml-in input_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-elif output_simulation_state>
 AND stock.quantity<0
 AND (<dtml-in output_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlExpression()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlExpression(strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 GROUP BY
 <dtml-if group_by_expression>
 <dtml-var group_by_expression>
 <dtml-else>
 stock.uid, stock.node_uid, stock.resource_uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if order_by_expression>
 ORDER BY
 <dtml-var order_by_expression>
 </dtml-if>

SELECT
 SUM(stock.quantity) AS inventory,
 SUM(stock.quantity) AS total_quantity,
 SUM(stock.price * stock.quantity) AS total_price,
 stock.price AS average_price,
 node.title AS node_title,
 node.relative_url AS node_relative_url,
 section.title AS section_title,
 section.relative_url AS section_relative_url,
 resource.title AS resource_title,
 resource.relative_url AS resource_relative_url,
 stock.variation_text AS variation_text,
 stock.aggregate_text AS aggregate_text,
 stock.resource_uid AS resource_uid,
 stock.uid AS stock_uid,
 stock.date as date,
 stock.simulation_state as simulation_state,
 catalog.path as path
 
 FROM
 stock
 LEFT JOIN catalog AS section ON (section.uid = stock.section_uid)
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="from_table_list"> 
 <dtml-if expr="table_key != 'stock'">
 , <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>, <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>, <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlJoinExpression()"> </dtml-if>
 , catalog as node, catalog as resource
 
 WHERE
 1 = 1
 <dtml-if where_expression>
 AND <dtml-var where_expression>
 </dtml-if>
 
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 AND resource.uid = stock.resource_uid
 
 <dtml-comment>
 XXX How to deal with standardize ?
 </dtml-comment>
 
 <dtml-if omit_simulation>
 AND catalog.portal_type != "Simulation Movement"
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 AND ( stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR inventory_movement.destination_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 AND ( stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR inventory_movement.destination_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL )
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if input_simulation_state>
 <dtml-if output_simulation_state>
 <dtml-if "input_simulation_state == output_simulation_state">
 AND (<dtml-in input_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)
 <dtml-else>
 AND ((stock.quantity>0
 AND (<dtml-in input_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>))
 OR (stock.quantity<0
 AND (<dtml-in output_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)))
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-else>
 AND stock.quantity>0
 AND (<dtml-in input_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-elif output_simulation_state>
 AND stock.quantity<0
 AND (<dtml-in output_simulation_state>stock.simulation_state = '<dtml-var sequence-item>'
 <dtml-unless sequence-end> OR </dtml-unless></dtml-in>)
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_domain.asSqlExpression()">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "selection_report.asSqlExpression(strict_membership=1)">
 </dtml-if>
 GROUP BY
 <dtml-if group_by_expression>
 <dtml-var group_by_expression>
 <dtml-else>
 stock.uid, stock.node_uid, stock.resource_uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if order_by_expression>
 ORDER BY
 <dtml-var order_by_expression>
 </dtml-if>
